entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • None image content is now compressed and served via gzip

âš¡ Fixes

  • fix base config persisting when person/album url param set by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/226
  • fix mime type when using the raw image endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/228

Other changes

  • Documentation: Adding an example of using Google Cast provided by chris.burrow by @chris-burrow-apps in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/229

New Contributors

  • @chris-burrow-apps made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.4...v0.14.5

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.6
entry.content:
Displaying Album and People Names

Show names by setting show_album_name or show_person_name to true when using a person ID, album ID, or special album keywords.

Multiple People/Album URL Fix

Fixed bug where only one person/album was processed when multiple were specified in the URL.

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • display album/person name by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/233

âš¡ Fixes

  • fix for multiple albums and people in url queries by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/236

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • dependencies update by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/232

Other changes

  • Feature/docker best practices by @benlinton in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/230

New Contributors

  • @benlinton made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.5...v0.14.6

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.14.7
entry.content:
Weather

Fixed an issue where if the frontend requested weather data before Kiosk had received it (for the first time) it would cause an error. Now Kiosk will use a retry loop before throwing an error.

What's Changed

âš¡ Fixes

  • Fix/weather resilience by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/243

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • updated dependencies by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.14.6...v0.14.7
